import React from 'react' import SectionTitle from '../../components/SectionTitle' function About() { return (

I’m Tresor Nyiringoma Habimana, a Software Engineer based in Kigali, Rwanda. Currently pursuing my Bachelor's in Software Engineering at the University of Rwanda, I specialize in backend development, web technologies, and databases. With hands-on experience in languages like Java, Python, C++, and JavaScript, I’ve developed a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, including React.js, MongoDB, and MySQL.

In addition to my freelance work as a Backend Developer at Sourcify, I’m also a Mentor at ALX Africa, where I guide emerging tech talent. I’m passionate about solving complex problems and collaborating with others to drive innovation. Always eager to learn and grow, I seek opportunities to contribute my skills to impactful projects that foster change and progress in the tech industry.

) } export default About
